ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 267
ygData.msgSnippet: Being Level 50, i need to ask you a question...I am level 41, and have been working on getting my INT up, not my CHA. my int is 189, and my cha is 135 with
ygData.messageBody:
Being Level 50, i need to ask you a question...I am level 41, and have been
working on getting my INT up, not my CHA.
my int is 189, and my cha is 135 with buff.

I hear for the Planes you really need a high CHA, can you comment on this
Maelael?

Thanx

-Aeramus, 41 Enchanter, Bristlebane

----- Original Message -----
From: Andrew Collins <ACollins@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, April 03, 2000 10:21 AM
Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 267


> I would just like to add that I tried to mes Choon, and he broke it within
3
> seconds, SGs I have been able to mes long enough for me to get ahead to
> zone.
> However, Fire Giants and Ice Giants will break it immediately, it will say
> they have been "entranced" but wont miss a swing. Seafury cyclops also
> cannot be mesd for longer than 1 second. The Giant Wooly Spider in
> Permafrost can be mesd. Youll also find that everything in the planes,
save
> for Spite Golems, can be mez, but can be very tricky to get under control.
>
> -Maelael, 50th Enchanter, Veeshan.
>
>
>
> >On most things mez is a fixed duration. All giant class creatures are
> highly
> >resistant to mez (lasts half as long as on other critters or less). Other
> >high level critters are immune to mez also.
>
>
>
